name: Defend or Die
overview:
A spectacular battle in which your ability and reflexes are subject to the limits of your possibilities and your nerves will withstand the maximum tension. Their mission is to save humanoid beings from their extermination from the face of the earth by the evil invaders who will transport them to outer space, where, eventually, they will mutate and be driven to their spaceships.

In this terrible battle, you must be careful with Sas flying squads, alien bombers, deadly baits that are certainly not in your favor.
